pli-tv-pvr6:1.4: [Sp 4.320](): _Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṃ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṃ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṃ_, “Two offenses: there is an offense entailing confession for one ordaining a person less than twenty years old. There is an offense of wrong conduct in regard to all the other clauses.” In the following cases, I will just note the classes of offenses that are mentioned in the commentary.
pli-tv-pvr6:2.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
